intro.name: Daniel Pipkin.
intro.main: I'm a software developer living in Raleigh, NC specializing in building beautiful websites and turning complex problems into creative and intuitive solutions.

body: I'm Daniel, a software engineer based in Raleigh, NC

I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.
Here are the main technologies I've been working with recently:

projects.title: IBM Sterling OM benefits calculator
projects.description: Benefits calculator estimating how IBM Sterling Order Management can help your bottom line using Gatsby and Carbon Design components.

projects.title: Ping Identity Assessment
projects.description: Cross-currency assessment identifying security threats using JQuery and SASS.

projects.title: IBM i 30th Anniversary
projects.description: Dynamic Microsite celebrating 30 years of innovation using JQuery, HandleBars, IBMv19, and SASS.
